CustomField.formula: CASE(Status, "New", IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/mailFrontEnv16.gif","New"), "Working", IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/pencil12.gif","Working"), "New Input", IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/mailCloseEnv16.gif","New Input"), "Waiting For Response", IMAGE("/img/staleValue.gif","Waiting For Response"), "Closed", IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/checkmark16.gif","Closed"), IMAGE("/s.gif", "No Status Flag"))
CustomField.label: Status Flag
